content.en_US: Zinc is a space fork material found on all planets. used mostly in the production of [[rubber|Rubber]] and [[gunmetal|Gunmetal]]. Worlds created in regular NTM will not have this ore in already generated chunks, you'll have to search for it!
content.zh_CN: 锌是NTM:S中的一种能在任何行星上找到的材料。通常被用于生产[[橡胶|Rubber]]和[[炮铜|Gunmetal]]。常规NTM下创建的区块中不会生成该矿物，您必须自行寻找。
